patterns: how long will it take to complete a course
responses:
Our college offers 4 years B.Tech program, BBA, BBA DIGITAL BUSINESS & BCA program,
2 years MCA,MBA,MPT & M.Tech program & 4.5 years BPT program, 1 year for DIY

patterns: what is the location of the college
responses:
University of Engineerimg & Management is located at udaipuriya mod,sikar road,chomu,
Jaipur,Rajasthan 6 kms from Chomu, JAIPUR 303807

patterns: how many semesters are there in a year
how many semesters one should study in a year
responses: There are two semesters in a year.

patterns: how many months are there in a semester
how long will be a single semester
responses: The single semester will be around 5 months.

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission
responses:
Academic Level :
Candidate must have to score minimum of 60% in their 10+2 exams
For Post Graduation courses there must be 60% in respected Graduation courses

patterns: how many classes will be there in a day
responses:
There may be five to six classes per day. Each class will be of 1 hour. 2 labs each day.
And after classes there must be mentoring session for each and every student.

patterns: what is the teaching style of this college?
Is the teaching pattern different from other college?
responses:
Our college has different teaching patterns than other colleges of Rajasthan.
We adopt a British teaching methodology, following the LTW techniques which stands for
Lecture, Tutorial and Workshop.
You can provide us with your contact details and our counselors shall reach out to you
and provide you with further details.
There is 2 mid term exams in each semester and end semester examinations at the end of the semester
You can contact us at any hours. But our college premises will be open from 9:00 am to 5:00 pm only. Monday to Friday

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities?
does the college conducts any fun program
responses:
Yes, Of course. Our college not only provides excellent education but also encourage students
to take part in different curriculum activities.
College conducts yearly programs like Sports meet, Carnival, Holi festival, and Internation Conferences.
Also our college has basketball court, badminton court,Cricket ground, table tennis,
chess, carrom board and many more refreshment zones.

patterns: what facilities are provided by the college?
what are the facilities of college for students
responses:
With excellent education facilities, Our College provides various other facilities like
24 hours internet, library, hygenic classes, discusson room, canteen, parking space,
and student service for any students queries.

Placements
Highest salary offer at UEM Jaipur: Rs 72 lakhs per annum
Average Salary offered: Rs 5.5 LPA
Placement legacy of 30 years – all eligible students of all passout batches of
UEM Jaipur got 1 to 2 job offers on average
Placement of UEM continues till the last student is offered a job
In 2022 till now, 1 Student got 7 Job Offer, 3 Students got 6 Job, 3 Students got 5 Job Offers,
5 students got 4 job offers, 18 students got 3 job offers, 28 students got 2 job offers,
42 students got 1 job offers
Till now 161 companies have conducted placements for UEM JAIPUR students.
Major Recruiter – TCS, Wipro, Capgemini, Infosys, HCL, Harman International, MTX, PWC,
Metacube, Pratham Software, Greenway Health, Place Technology
Zunomoneta, HashedIn by Delloite, and many more.

Scholarship for IEMJEE candidates
25% scholarship on first-semester tuition fees
Eligibility: 60% aggregate score in IEMJEE examination (only for B. Tech students)
Scholarship for Programmes after 10+2
20% scholarship on tuition fees
Eligibility: 95% aggregate and above in CBSE / ISC / State Boards of Class X & XII
15% scholarship on tuition fees
Eligibility: 90% aggregate and above in CBSE / ISC / State Boards of Class X & XII
12% scholarship on tuition fees
Eligibility: 85% aggregate and above in CBSE / ISC / State Boards of Class X & XII
Scholarship for Programmes after Graduation
20% scholarship on tuition fees
Eligibility: 95% aggregate and above in CBSE / ISC / State Boards of Class X & XII and
85% in Graduation
15% scholarship on tuition fees
Eligibility: 90% aggregate and above in CBSE / ISC / State Boards of Class X & XII and 
80% in Graduation
12% scholarship on tuition fees
Eligibility: 85% aggregate and above in CBSE / ISC / State Boards of Class X & XII and
75% in Graduation &
Sports Scholarships also.

Internships
All students undergo at least 3 internships during his/her course duration
Few companies NTPC Ltd., WBSETCL, N.F. Railway, Damodar Valley Corporation,
Metal & Steel Factory Ishapore and so on.
Internship opportunities in all top reputed companies of the country

Recognition
Established by Govt. of Rajasthan, Act 5 of 2012
Recognized by UGC, Ministry of HRD, Govt of India
The School of Engineering and Management under UEM Jaipur is called Institute of Engineering
& Management (IEM), Jaipur. IEM Jaipur is approved by AICTE.
Member of Association of Indian Universities (AIU).
Member of Association Commonwealth Universities, London, UK
Accredited by ICRA

The Campus
Total Area: 32 acres huge green campus
Total plinth area of Buildings : 3,38,000 sq ft
Total Number of students : 1020
Total Hostel capacity : 1100
Total Buses for the students : 2
Total Number of Faculty Members : 76
Total Number of Support Staff : 38

Student's projects
Mini-CNC Machine
Manufacturing of 3-D printer
Micro Human Walker
Console from E-waste
Gesture controlled robot, Remote controlled plane
Concept demonstration of a Rotating Bridge
Water Sprinkling cycle
GSM based smart enery meter and many more.
High Quality funded students’ projects like GPS Based Drones, Manufacturing of 3-D Printer,
Robotic Arm, Humanoid Walker, Detonators, Manufacturing of All Terrain Vehicle,
Manufacturing of Formula-1 Car etc.

Computing Environment
333 computers with 1:1 usage of students:computers during laboratory period
HDD-160GB, RAM-2GB/4GB
LINUX OS, Dual Core, Core2 DUO
HP XEON SERVER
Completely backed by UPS
Licensed software
1 GBPs Internet speed, highest in India amongst all educational institutions

Laboratories
Industry standard equipments in all laboratories
High End Language Laboratory
Electronics & Communication Engineering Lab (Microwave Lab)
Electronics & Communication Engineering Lab (Analog Electronics Lab)
Electronics & Communication Engineering Lab (Communication Laboratory)
Electronics & Communication Engineering Lab (Systems Laboratory)
Electronics & Communication Engineering Lab (Microprocessor & Microcontroller Lab)
Mechanical Engineering Department Lab (Workshop Technology)
Mechanical Engineering Department Lab (IC Engine Lab)

Library
Open 24 hrs x 365 days in a year
15000+ Books with 1:1 student:book usage on all books
1500 books added each year
2500 Foreign and Indian Journals
Innumerable e-books available through National Digital Library subscription of University
Library managed through KOHA and IEMCRP software
Big reading room and Multimedia PCs
Subscription to Internationally renowned Digital Libraries like IEEE, JGATE, DELNET etc
Availability of Massive Open Online Courses (MOOCs) like NPTEL, SWAYAM, SWAYAM
PRABHA, e-PG Pathshala, CEC

Memorandum of Understanding  MOUs
MOUs with foreign universities like Brunel University, London, ESC RENNES School of Business,
Iwate Prefectural University, Japan
Any student can go to American, European Universities for semester abroad program /internships
and stay there for 6 months / 1 month without paying any extra tuition fees
UEM organizes conferences abroad where students can go and present their
research papers in front of delegates from at least 71 countries
eg. in Columbia University, New York,USA, Brunel University, London and so on

Student Chapters
UEM Jaipur is a local chapter of NPTEL
Has a very active ICI student chapter
ISHRAE student chapter
A very active ACM student chapter
Codesta Coding Club
IEEE Student branch
SAEINDIA Collegiate Club and UEM Motosports Club
Entrepreneurship Cell named called BEACON
Sports club, Dance club and Music club UEM
Dronnesters
CII Confederation of Indian Industries Chapter, UEM ACM USA Student Chapter

Faculty
One of the most reputed branch of faculty members many of whom are
nationally awarded for their contributions to the field of technicality
More than 2000 research publications, more than 50 books and 18 patents in
the last three years by the faculty members
Industrial consultancies are obtained by the faculty members in which students can
participate and contribute

patterns: does UEM supports student in startups
responses:
Startups
University has got an existing very prominent incubation centre from where students are
supported to start-up with their own industry
Notable start-ups from UEM Jaipur are Robomaniax, Tech On, Socho Aur Chhapo
Mayank Singh Rajput, founder of ROBOMANIAX, an organisation engaged in providing Robotics
and Technology based education to the young minds through schooling education system
in India.

Online Study Materials
Adopted to the most modern way of international teaching namely flip classes.
All lecture videos are available in the University’s media channel Gymkhana TV
All lecture notes are available online
Students come prepared to classes from lecture notes and videos as stated above and they
discuss application oriented studies in class hours, which leads to better industry acceptable
engineers/managers

UEM Jaipur provides for CBCS syllabus, which allows a student to choose his own career
and prepare accordingly. He/she can choose those papers early and learn those more on
which he/she intends to pursue his/her career.
Placement of UEM Jaipur continues till the last student is placed.
Even if placement needs to continue for one student, placement in UEM Jaipur is made
to continue. Till now, all students of all batches have always passed with job offers.
There is no example of a student passing out without a job offer.

Major Recruiter
TCS, Wipro, Capgemini, Infosys, HCL, Harman International, MTX, PWC, Metacube,
Pratham Software, Greenway Health, Place Technology, Zunomoneta, HashedIn by Delloite and many more.
Till now 161 companies have conducted placements for UEM JAIPUR students.
